title: Supreme Court Confirms 20-Year Prison Sentence for Ex-VP Dick Cheney?
subtitle: The Huffington Post published a satirical item set in the future about Dick Cheney's being sentenced to 20 years in prison for war crimes, confusing some readers.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Supreme Court has upheld former Vice President Dick Cheney's sentence of 20 years in prison on charges related to war crimes.
